overview: Mr. Hamzeh co-founded GlobalTel Media to target a need for mass-market enablement of on-line content for delivery to mobile phones. Prior to founding GTM in 2003, Mr. Hamzeh served as Business Development Manager for PC-Ephone Inc., a publicly traded company, and won Best of Show at COMDEX and PC-Expo. Mr. Hamzeh also served as the lead designer for Everypath where he played an integral role in designing and launching mobile applications for companies such as E*Trade and Alaska Airlines. Mr. Hamzeh earned a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration degree with a concentration in Management Information Systems from California Polytechnic State University.
